text: Kim Dong-beom (born January 26, 1991) is a South Korean actor. Kim made his acting debut in 2007, and has appeared in mostly bit parts and supporting roles. His major roles have been in Jungle Fish 2 (2010) and Kong's Family (2013). == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable" style="width:550px" |- ! width=10|Year ! Title !
